meanings.definition: Sleep longer or later than intended.
meanings.sent1: I always end up oversleeping on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She oversleeps every time she stays up late.
meanings.sent3: Oversleeping can make you miss important events.
meanings.sent4: His habit of oversleeping is like a thief stealing precious morning hours.
meanings.sent5: Don't oversleep and be late for the bus!

meanings.definition: To sleep beyond the usual or proper time for waking.
meanings.sent1: They missed the meeting due to oversleeping.
meanings.sent2: I tend to oversleep when I forget to set an alarm.
meanings.sent3: Oversleeping might lead to funny dreams about being late.
meanings.sent4: Her oversleeping stretched time like a rubber band.
meanings.sent5: Avoid oversleeping by going to bed early.
